与香槟软木塞相关的眼部损伤可能对眼睛健康构成重大威胁《英国医学杂志》圣诞特刊警告研究人员，这个假期要小心。打开汽水瓶时眼睛受伤可能会很严重，但很容易避免。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Champagne-cork-lated-eye-injuries-can-be-a-substantial-threat-to-eye-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Champagne-cork-lated-eye-injuries-can-be-a-substantial-threat-to-eye-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6adf5664-92d9-46a6-8651-f294a697f1dd Thu, 21 Dec 2023 13:16:07 -0500 Champagne cork related eye injuries can be a substantial threat to eye health
UKHSA 宣布抗生素耐药志贺氏菌病例增加UKHSA 宣布，对抗生素具有广泛耐药性的宋内志贺氏菌感染病例不断增加，主要发生在同性恋、双性恋和其他男男性行为者 (GBMSM) 中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UKHSA-announces-concerning-rise-in-antibiotic-pressive-Shigella-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UKHSA-announces-concerning-rise-in-antibiotic-pressive-Shigella-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e458de5a-63e2-4274-9d00-def89f4050b3 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 13:06:18 -0500 UKHSA announces concerning rise in antibiotic-resistant Shigella cases
